title: Festival of family classics. -Volume 2.
brief_description: Features 2 family classics; “Around the world in 80 days” Part 1 & 2; Phineas Fogg, accompanied by his loyal valet, Passpartout, embark on a wager to circle the world in 80 days. Their ability to meet the deadline is threatened by Detective Fix who mistakes Fogg for a bank robber. “Puss in boots”; Orlando the cat learns to talk thanks to a pair of magic boots. Will he use his new power for good? Introduced by Chelsea Brown.
